entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 32. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023
